content.title: Configure the Data Model
content.body:
1. From the left pane select the Data Model tab.
  2. Under the Data Model tab, expand Data Model > Recipients > Fields, and select RecipientID.
  3. In the right pane, modify the following values.
    • Type: number
    • Autogenerated: true
  4. Click Save.
  5. In the left pane, navigate to Data Model > Recipients > Fields, and then select Phone.
  6. In the right pane, modify the following value.
    • Max Length: 30
  7. Click Save.
